actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit certain private non-profit organizations to deposit mailable matter in letter boxes.

summary.text: Permits any volunteer member of a private nonprofit organization to deposit for such organization, postage free, any mailable matter relating to the activities or functions of such organization in any letterbox.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit certain private non-profit organizations to deposit mailable matter in letter boxes.
